title: These VR Gloves are ACTUALLY INSANE - and I got to try them
description:
This past week I went to AWE otherwise known as the Augmented World Expo! One of the worlds largest XR conferences! At this event I got to see SO much amazing technology, it boggled my mind- From Haptx gloves to the Varjo XR3 and the most cutting edge consumer AR glasses available. 

Thank you to Qualcomm for sponsoring this video and getting PHIA and I out to AWE to share the experience!
Follow @Snapdragon on Twitter, @SnapdragonOfficial on Instagram, and join the Snapdragon Insiders community at www.snapdragoninsiders.com

Links to things in this video:
Holokit iPhone AR: https://holokit.io/
Tilt 5 AR: https://www.tiltfive.com/
Etee Controllers: https://eteexr.com/
More coming...
